tasks.label: build and run file
args: if [[ '${fileExtname}' == '.c' ]]; then gcc -g '${file}' -o '${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}' && '${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}'; else g++ -g '${file}' -o '${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}' && '${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}'; fi; read -n1 -r -p "\nPress any key to close..."
